scripts.build: pnpm run build-scripts && pnpm run esbuild
scripts.esbuild: pnpm exec esbuild --format=iife --main-fields=module,main --bundle --outdir=dist --sourcemap=inline src/background.ts src/service-worker.ts src/options.ts src/content.ts src/inject.ts
scripts.render-readme: cat README.md | grep -v '^# ' | pnpm exec marked > web/readme.html
scripts.build-web: pnpm run build-scripts && cp node_modules/sanitize.css/sanitize.css web/ && pnpm run update-web
scripts.package-mv2: pnpm run use-mv2 && pnpm run build && web-ext build --artifacts-dir web-ext-artifacts/mv2 --ignore-files src web scripts *.iml tsconfig.json tsconfig.tsbuildinfo pnpm-lock.yaml dist/service-worker.js
scripts.package-mv3: pnpm run use-mv3 && pnpm run build && web-ext build --artifacts-dir web-ext-artifacts/mv3 --ignore-files src web scripts *.iml tsconfig.json tsconfig.tsbuildinfo pnpm-lock.yaml dist/background.js
